productArticleDetails.deliveryAndPaymentMessage: For full details please visit our customer service pages.
productArticleDetails.deliveryMessage: Free standard delivery for all members when spending £40 or more. Delivery to an H&M store is free with no minimum spend. Delivery charge for external brands might vary.  We accept card payments via  MasterCard, Visa and American Express. You can also pay by Klarna, PayPal, Apple Pay and H&M gift card.  We offer flexible return options. You have 30 days (14 days for sale items) from delivery to register your return.

reviewsLegal.label: I accept {URL1}terms and conditions{/URL}
reviewsLegal.validationText: Please accept the terms and conditions to continue.
reviewsLegal.finePrint: The information you provide will be handled in accordance with our {URL2}Privacy notice{/URL}

1296073001.name: Black

materialDetails.name: LENZING™ ECOVERO™ viscose
materialDetails.description: LENZING™ ECOVERO™ viscose is a branded viscose fibre, made from wood pulp.

materialDetails.name: Polyamide
materialDetails.description: Polyamide, also called nylon, is a synthetic fibre made from oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.name: Polyester
materialDetails.description: Polyester is a synthetic fibre made from crude oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.name: Viscose
materialDetails.description: Viscose is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood, but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.

1296073001.description: Blouse in twill with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Pleats at the waist for a nipped-in silhouette.

learnMore.linkText: Learn more about the materials in this product

preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsIntro: The total weight of this product contains at least
preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsExplanation: We exclude the weight of minor components such as, but not exclusively: threads, buttons, zippers, embellishments and prints.
preferredMaterialsExplained.additionalMaterialsCalculation: The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that, we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets & multipacks all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.

deliveryDetails.deliveryAdditionalInfo: Free standard delivery for all members when spending £40 or more. Delivery to an H&M store is free with no minimum spend. Delivery charge for external brands might vary.  We accept card payments via  MasterCard, Visa and American Express. You can also pay by Klarna, PayPal, Apple Pay and H&M gift card.  We offer flexible return options. You have 30 days (14 days for sale items) from delivery to register your return.

materialDetails.description: Polyamide, also called nylon, is a synthetic fibre made from oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.description: Polyester is a synthetic fibre made from crude oil (a fossil resource).

materialDetails.name: Viscose
materialDetails.description: Viscose is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood, but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.

gdpr.bodyText: Your privacy is important to us which is why we want to inform you on our updated Privacy Notice. To give you a more transparent and clear information on how we process your personal data, we have divided the Privacy Notice into different chapters. Depending on if you are a subscriber, member or if you have an H&M Account, different parts of the notice will apply to you. In each chapter, we describe in more detail what personal data we have about you and how we use it. We have also increased the information on your rights, for example how to get access to your data and how you can request to terminate the usage of your data.
gdpr.linkText: You can find our Privacy Notice here

higg.heading: Materials environmental impact
descriptions: The materials in this product show less than a 12.5% reduction across four key environmental impacts, when compared to conventional materials (for example, organic cotton compared to regular cotton).
The materials in this product show at least a 12.5% reduction across four key environmental impacts, when compared to conventional materials (for example, organic cotton compared to regular cotton).
The materials in this product show at least a 25% reduction across four key environmental impacts, when compared to conventional materials (for example, organic cotton compared to regular cotton).
The materials in this product show at least a 50% reduction across four key environmental impacts, when compared to conventional materials (for example, organic cotton compared to regular cotton).
higg.breakdownDescription: The materials in this product show the following reductions in impact when compared to conventional versions of the same materials (for example, a recycled material compared to its virgin version).

disclaimer.description: The Higg Index was developed by the Sustainable Apparel Coalition, a global multi-stakeholder nonprofit organization. At H&M, we use the Higg Index to measure and report on the sustainability of product materials.
disclaimer.linkText: Read more about the Higg Index.

higg.claim: Click here for full data and methodology information
higg.explanatoryText: These ratings are based on the environmental impact of a product’s materials, which represent the majority of a garment’s total impact. The calculated reductions presented here do not reflect regional variations but are a representative of global average impacts.

sustainability.introText: We believe that greater transparency will help lead the change towards a more sustainable future. As a step in this long-term commitment, we’re sharing how and where our products are made wherever possible.
sustainability.introTextNoSuppliers: We believe that greater transparency will help lead the change towards a more sustainable fashion future. As a first step in this long-term commitment, we’re sharing how our products are made wherever possible.

materials.bodyText: Our goal is to use 100% recycled or other sustainably sourced materials by 2030.

suppliers.bodyTextCountryList: This product has been produced in one of the following countries:
suppliers.buttonSeeAllText: Suppliers and factories for this product.
suppliers.introText: All our products are made by independent suppliers, often in developing countries where our presence can make a real difference. Our business helps to create jobs and independence, particularly for women — consequently lifting people out of poverty and contributing to economic growth.   We only work with partners who share our respect for people and the environment, and who are willing to work with us to improve their practices. All suppliers and factories must sign our strict Sustainability Commitment, which includes requirements for fair wages and good working conditions for all. We employ dedicated sustainability staff in our worldwide production offices to make sure the commitment is followed.
suppliers.sorryText: Unfortunately, supplier and factory information isn’t currently available for this product. Thank you for being patient while we work towards displaying these details for all H&M items possible.
suppliers.disclaimerTop: These suppliers and factories made this product for H&M globally, which means that the item you will receive is produced by one of these suppliers and one of their factories.
suppliers.disclaimerLabelsupplierAndFactoryExplana: We want to be completely transparent with you about how and where our products are made, and we have a new system for this.

However, if an item was produced before we started using our new system, all the supplier information may not be available. We’re focusing our efforts on making sure all items going forwards display all supplier details.
If we stop working with a supplier or factory, we’ll only display the last information that we had at the point of collaboration.
Thank you for bearing with us while we work towards greater transparency.
suppliers.supplierInformationText1: Independent suppliers make all our products in many parts of the world. Suppliers and factories who work with us must sign our Sustainability Commitment, and we employ staff in our worldwide production offices to ensure the commitment is followed.
suppliers.supplierInformationText2: If you want to learn more about our Sustainability Commitment, and our work with suppliers and factories in general, visit “Standards & policies” at hmgroup.com.
suppliers.supplierInformationText3: As for now, we can only share this information for H&M products.

NewMaterialAccordion.additionalMaterialsIntro: The total weight of this product contains at least
NewMaterialAccordion.additionalMaterialsExplanation: We exclude the weight of minor components such as, but not exclusively: threads, buttons, zippers, embellishments and prints.
NewMaterialAccordion.additionalMaterialsCalculation: The total weight of the product is calculated by adding the weight of all layers and main components together. Based on that, we calculate how much of that weight is made out by each material. For sets & multipacks all pieces are counted together as one product in calculations.

fashionRecycler.bodyText: Bring your clean, previously loved clothing or textiles to one of our stores — they can be from any brand.
